description: Creates a list of attractions for someone traveling to a city given their preferences

input_variables.name: city
input_variables.description: The city the person wants to travel to

input_variables.name: n_days
input_variables.description: The number of days the person will be in the city

input_variables.name: likes
input_variables.description: The interests of the person traveling to the city

input_variables.name: dislikes
input_variables.description: The dislikes of the person traveling to the city

input_variables.name: n_attractions
input_variables.description: The number of attractions to recommend
